title: U.S. Journalist Held In Syria Since 2012 Is Freed
teaser: Peter Theo Curtis was released by Jabhat al-Nusra, known as the Nusra Front. Last week, American journalist James Foley was beheaded in Syria by the group which now calls itself the Islamic State.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
